statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Saint Mary's holds off Pepperdine 80-74
article.story: MORAGA, Calif. -- Brad Waldow scored 21 points and Stephen Holt had 20 as Saint Mary's held off Pepperdine 80-74 on Thursday night. Waldow had 13 rebounds -- including seven offensive boards -- as Saint Mary's (15-5, 5-2 West Coast) out-rebounded Pepperdine (12-9, 5-4) 41-34. Kerry Carter added 18 for the Gaels, while Beau Levesque had 13. Brendan Lane led Pepperdine with 18 points. Saint Mary's jumped out early, using an 8-0 run to go up 13-5 at the 13:10 mark of the first half, en route to a 40-35 lead at the break. Pepperdine pulled within one early in the second half on Jeremy Major's 3-pointer, but Saint Mary's pushed back with a 12-3 run. The Waves cut it to two at 62-60 with 7:15 left, but they never could get over the hump, as Saint Mary's made 13 of 18 free throws from that point to seal the win.
